text: I have a small feature addition to the extension I could use some help on if anyone wants to give it a go. Should be easy to add, just need basic jquery and css skills. It will be a lot of fun and users will get a kick out of it. No git skills necessary.
if no one steps up, ask again on wednesday when i will have a better feel for me weekly workload :slightly_smiling_face:
What are you looking for Jon?
